teaser: Teach for America wants to close the achievement gap by sending future leaders to some of the nation’s toughest schools. […]
title: Can Teach for America Keep Its Promise?
contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"

Teach for America wants to close the achievement gap by sending future leaders to some of the nation’s toughest schools. Critics say it’s a flawed idea, but TFA’s clout and budget keep growing.

"},{"content":"
","type":"text/html"},{"content":"

Guest: Elisa Villanueva Beard, Co-CEO, Teach for America.

"}]
contentencoded:
Teach for America wants to close the achievement gap by sending future leaders to some of the nation’s toughest schools. Critics say it’s a flawed idea, but TFA’s clout and budget keep growing.


Guest: Elisa Villanueva Beard, Co-CEO, Teach for America.
description: Teach for America wants to close the achievement gap by sending future leaders to some of the nation’s toughest schools. […]
